about_the_game:
Conquer back your homeworld, taken over by strange crystal-like lifeforms that suddenly appeared 22 years ago after a calamity. You were forced to retreat and spent years researching possible options to counteract them. And you’ve finally found it! Build complex defenses from basic blocks, find the origin of the calamity and wipe out all hostile creatures in this original tower-based RTS.

Features

  • Pattern-based building process: every tower is constructed from patterns of simple blocks. Build your defenses piece by piece the way you like it, upgrade, combine, optimize space and resources to survive against the overwhelming forces.
  • Three enemy life forms: cuboids, spheroids and polygonoids, each operating differently and requiring a unique strategy to overcome.
  • Freedom of strategy and flexible defense perimeter: Go for quick low-tier tower rush or bunk with well-defended artillery posts, then collect your blocks and rebuild the defenses on the spot — just mind the free space and resources left.
  • Indirect control over your forces. Get up to a strategic level and don't waste your time with routine tasks: plan your defenses and issue orders while your units do all the work.
  • Over 40 levels with varied gameplay and different objectives, taking place in seven distinct biomes.

The Hex World needs your protection!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 5 series or better
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7 series or better
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or similar

short_description: HEX Defense is a tower-based strategy game set in a hexagonal world where you have to fight enemy forces by combining simple blocks into complex tower patterns.
